column2: Marathon Patent Group, Inc. is a digital asset technology company, which mines cryptocurrencies, with a focus on the blockchain ecosystem and the generation of digital assets. The company is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada and currently employs 3 full-time employees. The firm focuses on the blockchain ecosystem and the generation of digital assets. The firm is operating one mining facility in Quebec, with plans to open additional facilities in the future. The firm offers managed mining solutions on its robust proprietary infrastructure and smart mining software. The firm intends to power and secure blockchains by verifying blockchain transactions using custom hardware and software. The company is using its hardware to mine bitcoin (BTC) and expect to mine BTC and ether (ETH), and potentially other cryptocurrencies.
